name: No Longer Home: Friary Road
description:
Back the series on Kickstarter!

A magical realist point and click short. Bo and Ao are the last ones left after a barbecue and find themselves stargazing.

Prequel to the series No Longer Home.

Re-imagined from a game made for the Fermi Paradox Jam.

Soundtrack by Paws Menu
